channel.title: Solidity on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Solidity on Home

item.title: My First DApp
item.description: In order to understand the blockchain and its application DApp, I finished my first smart contract with Solidity and interacted with it through React based frontend website.

item.title: My First Smart Contract
item.description: In order to understand the blockchain and its application DApp, I try to experiment my first smart contract with Solidity on Ethereum IDE Remix.
